footer.licence_1: Tout le contenu est disponible sous la licence

home.title: Payer une pénalité DVSA
home.description_2: Votre avis de pénalité DVSA vous indiquera combien vous devez payer et la date limite pour payer.
home.info_text: Si vous ne payez pas votre amende à temps, votre véhicule restera immobilisé ou vos informations seront transmises à une agence de recouvrement de créances.
home.before_start_text: Il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec ces détails:

payment_code_page.title: Pay a DVSA Penalty
payment_code_page.hint: Ceci est un code émis avec l'avis de pénalité. Par exemple, 'a1b2c3d4e5f6g7h8'
payment_code_page.hidden_panel_title: I don't have a payment code
payment_code_page.hidden_panel_text: The DVSA examiner normally sends the payment code (or token) via SMS or email, at the time of processing the penalty. The code is usually sent to the driver of the vehicle or their company, as requested at the time of processing. If you are the intended recipient, you can recheck your email inbox or text messages, or request the DVSA examiner send the payment code again. Alternatively, you can contact the customer support centre, to arrange payment by using the penalty reference number, if that is available to you

error.title: There was a problem
error.description: The payment code you entered was not recognised by the system.

penalty_details_page.title: Penalty payment confirmation
penalty_details_page.confirmation: You paid a penalty for the payment code:
penalty_details_page.confirmation_sent: A confirmation has been sent to the DVSA location where the penalty has been issued.
penalty_details_page.hidden_panel_title: Il y a quelque chose d’anormal avec ces détails
penalty_details_page.hidden_panel_text: Please contact the customer support centre to confirm the correct penalty details.
penalty_details_page.share_email: Partager la confirmation de paiement via email
penalty_details_page.other: alternatively, make a note of the confirmation code for later reference.

failed_payment_page.title: Your payment has been declined
failed_payment_page.info:
No money has been taken from your account.
Contact your bank for more details.
